metadata.title: CVE-2019-9633 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: gio/gsocketclient.c in GNOME GLib 2.59.2 does not ensure that a parentGTask remains alive during the execution of a connection-attemptingenumeration, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(g_socket_client_connected_callback mishandling and application crash) viaa crafted web site, as demonstrated by GNOME Web (aka Epiphany).

criterions.comment: glib2.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
